notesStmt.note: Leviticus XVI 18 אשר לפני- ibid. 32 בגדי הקדש where writing is interrupted in the middle of the text, filling only half of one column of the verso (10 lines).
Condition: torn, holes and damage on all edges except for exterior edge.

msIdentifier.repository: Center for Advanced Judaic Studies Library

layoutDesc.layout: Columns: 2; lines: 19 (1r/a); 20 (1r/b); 10 (1v/a; line 8, part of verse 32, obliterated by erasure); ruling method: prickings on exterior edge.

history.provenance: Cairo Genizah Collection (University of Pennsylvania. Center for Advanced Judaic Studies. Library).
